p: The antioxidant effect of a dietary supplement (high molecular weight (MW) chitosan, trade name: Chitosamin ®, ~100 kDa, 90% degree of deacetylation (DD)) was tested in healthy individuals. The preparation caused a decrease of the lipid hydroperoxides and uremic toxins in the gastrointestinal tract, which contributed to the inhibition of the subsequent development of oxidative stress in the human systemic circulation. Chitosamin ® can be used as a preparation in the antioxidant treatment of many diseases, e.g., in renal failure [ 11].
